summary: Diff adds a Motoko backend actor with job/contact/admin authorization scaffolding, plus a TanStack Router-based frontend with header/footer, job cards/featured jobs, WhatsApp integration, configurable links, contact form submission UI, and an admin dashboard guard and job editor components. Several requirements cannot be fully verified because key page files and static assets are omitted/truncated in the diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add static asset handling for generated brand images: include the generated logo and favicon in the header and browser tab, and ensure they are served as static files from frontend/public/assets/generated.
missing_requirements.reason: Logo usage is evidenced in Header/Footer, but there is no evidence in the diff summary that the required generated image files were added under frontend/public/assets/generated, nor that the favicon is set in the browser tab (typically via index.html or equivalent).

hallucinated_features.description: User profile management APIs (get/save user profile) with a #user permission model.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request user profile features; it only requests admin-gated job management and contact inquiry storage.

hallucinated_features.description: Access-control initialization via a secret URL parameter (caffeineAdminToken) and backend initialization call _initializeAccessControlWithSecret.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest specifies admin gating via Internet Identity and a backend admin allowlist; it does not request a secret-token bootstrapping mechanism via URL parameters.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer credit link to caffeine.ai ('built with ... using ... caffeine.ai').
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in the BuildRequest footer requirements (which specify About, Quick links, Privacy Policy, Terms & Conditions, copyright).
